about_the_game:
They are coming !
Deploy strategically your Towers, upgrade them, control them globally and repel the enemy while managing your resource.
Pass each challenge and climb the online leaderboards in this colorful scifi Tower Defense game !

Smart Towers

  • Your Towers are stronger together, can have multiple upgrades and can be assigned priority target types in real time.

    "No path" Tower Defense game

  • Each enemy is autonomous and there is no predefined path !
  • Your choices immediately modify the dynamic of the fight for the whole map.

    100+ challenges !

  • Each map is playable in 4 to 8 Modes for more than 100 challenges !

    Leaderboards

  • Compare Your score to the best scores or just your Friends' through the Steam Leaderboards.

    Notes from me :)

  • Please, keep in mind, Tau Cubis is a solo game development, is not story driven and does not feature cinematic .
  • Tau Cubis is inspired by other games and especially the amazing franchise : Defense Grid.
  • I'd like to offer you a minimalist strategic Tower Defense game with colorful graphics and smart mechanics :)
  • Full Gamepad, Keyboard only, or Mouse and Keyboard : your choice !
  • Quick to learn, easy to play for intense 20 minutes session.
  • Online leaderboards, but you still can play offline and upload your scores later.



    Don't hesitate for any questions or feedback at taucubis@cubemandarine.com or in Tau Cubis Discord server !
